mapper.select: SELECT PRODUCT_ID, CATEGORY_ID, OPTION_SET_ID, NAME FROM SHOP_PRODUCT WHERE CATEGORY_ID = #{param1} ORDER BY PRODUCT_ID
SELECT CATEGORY_ID, UP_CATEGORY_ID, NAME FROM SHOP_CATEGORY WHERE UP_CATEGORY_ID = #{param1}
SELECT CATEGORY_ID, UP_CATEGORY_ID, NAME FROM SHOP_CATEGORY WHERE CATEGORY_ID = #{param1}
SELECT CATEGORY_ID, UP_CATEGORY_ID, NAME FROM SHOP_CATEGORY WHERE CATEGORY_ID = #{param1}

SELECT NVL(S4.CATEGORY_ID, NVL(S3.CATEGORY_ID, S2.CATEGORY_ID)) CATEGORY_ID, NVL(S4.UP_CATEGORY_ID, NVL(S3.UP_CATEGORY_ID, S2.UP_CATEGORY_ID)) UP_CATEGORY_ID, NVL(S4.NAME, NVL(S3.NAME, S2.NAME)) NAME FROM SHOP_CATEGORY S1 INNER JOIN SHOP_CATEGORY S2 ON S1.CATEGORY_ID = S2.UP_CATEGORY_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN SHOP_CATEGORY S3 ON S2.CATEGORY_ID = S3.UP_CATEGORY_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN SHOP_CATEGORY S4 ON S3.CATEGORY_ID = S4.UP_CATEGORY_ID WHERE S1.CATEGORY_ID = #{param1} ORDER BY CATEGORY_ID
SELECT LPAD(' ', 3 * (LEVEL - 1)) || NAME FROM SHOP_CATEGORY START WITH UP_CATEGORY_ID IS NULL CONNECT BY PRIOR CATEGORY_ID = UP_CATEGORY_ID
SELECT LEVEL, CATEGORY_ID, UP_CATEGORY_ID, NAME FROM SHOP_CATEGORY START WITH UP_CATEGORY_ID IS NULL CONNECT BY PRIOR CATEGORY_ID = UP_CATEGORY_ID

SELECT OPTION_SET_ID, NAME FROM SHOP_OPTION_SET WHERE OPTION_SET_ID = ( SELECT OPTION_SET_ID FROM SHOP_PRODUCT WHERE PRODUCT_ID = #{param1})
SELECT OPTION_SET_ID, NAME FROM SHOP_OPTION_SET WHERE OPTION_SET_ID = #{param1}
SELECT OPTION_ID, OPTION_SET_ID, SUB_OPTION_SET_ID, PRODUCT_DATA_ID, NAME FROM SHOP_OPTION WHERE OPTION_SET_ID = #{param1}
SELECT OPTION_ID, OPTION_SET_ID, SUB_OPTION_SET_ID, PRODUCT_DATA_ID, NAME FROM SHOP_OPTION WHERE OPTION_ID = #{param1}
SELECT PRODUCT_DATA_ID, STOCK, PRICE, DISCOUNTED_PRICE FROM SHOP_PRODUCT_DATA WHERE PRODUCT_DATA_ID = #{param1}

SELECT O.OPTION_ID, O.OPTION_SET_ID, O.NAME, D.STOCK, D.PRICE, D.DISCOUNTED_PRICE FROM SHOP_OPTION O JOIN SHOP_PRODUCT_DATA D ON O.PRODUCT_DATA_ID = D.PRODUCT_DATA_ID WHERE O.OPTION_SET_ID = #{param1}

SELECT O.OPTION_ID, O.OPTION_SET_ID, O.NAME, D.STOCK, D.PRICE, D.DISCOUNTED_PRICE FROM SHOP_OPTION O JOIN SHOP_PRODUCT_DATA D ON O.PRODUCT_DATA_ID = D.PRODUCT_DATA_ID WHERE O.OPTION_SET_ID = #{param1}
